history.note: Initial under-representation baseline — many common patterns (ko, ngs, nce) are near-zero in generated output. Thresholds start at 0; ratchet up as generator improves.

_comment: Quality ratchet: after each tuning fix, re-run 5× analysis (seeds 42/123/456/789/1337), update thresholds to new max + 10% margin (over-rep) or new min - 10% margin (under-rep), commit as part of fix PR.
